ItemTooltips.quelling_blade: Quelling Blade comes in handy when stacking your Goblin's Greed. If you can use this item to it's full potential, you'll be swimming in gold in no time.
ItemTooltips.stout_shield:
Stout Shield is an excellent item for Alchemist's early game since it provides protection against early game attacks, letting you stack Goblin's Greed further.

Later, this item will be built into Vangaurd
ItemTooltips.lifesteal:
Morbid Mask will provide some Lifesteal for early game kills or farm.

This item will be built into Mask of Madness.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: What can I say? They're really fast!
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Phase Boots will allow you to walk through units, making Unstable Concoction much easier to land. It also gives quite a nice early game attack.
ItemTooltips.hand_of_midas: Only get this if your farm is going to be good, if not, skip it for other core items.
ItemTooltips.assault: Pushing late game and the stacking with your Acid Spray does very well.
ItemTooltips.heart: If you're dying too much, get one of these.
ItemTooltips.radiance: Radiance is a good item to pick up if your farm is severe. It will automatically kill units around you in an AoE, stacking Goblin's Greed for you.
ItemTooltips.basher: Skull Basher will allow you to utilize your attack speed to the fullest potential, leaving your enemies stunned while you hack at them.
ItemTooltips.mjollnir: Direct upgrade of Maelstrom, get it, if you have the farm.
ItemTooltips.maelstrom: Maelstrom is a very core item in this build. It allows for Alchemist's Ultimate to be used as effectively as possible.
ItemTooltips.mask_of_madness: Mask of Madness is an excellent item for Alchemist, giving him easier farm, increased lifesteal, early ganking potential, and the ability to chase enemies with your Unstable Concoction.
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots: If you're dying a lot early game, get these instead of Phase.

AbilityTooltips.alchemist_acid_spray: Acid Spray will come in handy at later levels, reducing enemies armor while you 1-2-Punch them with Unstable Concoction, and your auto-attack.
AbilityTooltips.alchemist_unstable_concoction:
Use this ability with caution, as it can easily get you killed. Make sure to have good timing and a reliable back-up, in case you don't make the throw.
It's extremely good for getting early gank kills / first blood.
AbilityTooltips.alchemist_goblins_greed: Leveling this ability first will maximize your farm in the lane. Focus on last hitting creeps to keep the stack going.
AbilityTooltips.alchemist_chemical_rage:
This ability will, when activated:
Enhance your HP and Mana regeneration rate.
Improve your attack speed.
Make you run faster.
Fortunately, this ability is very able to spam. The duration is almost as long as the cooldown, so you can quickly dispatch enemies, farm, defend, and repeat.
